backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and recipe CRUD with access control for users and recipe owners.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report showing which frontend files implement authentication, recipe browsing, editing, theming, and static assets.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining a warm OKLCH color palette and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Router, theme provider, and top‑level page routes for browsing, viewing, creating, and editing recipes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer displaying copyright info and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with logo, navigation, login button, and authenticated‑only new‑recipe shortcut.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page shell component wrapping content with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/recipes/RecipeCa: Clickable recipe card showing title, description, ingredient count, and step count.
frontend/src/components/recipes/RecipeFo: Provides a form component for creating or editing recipes, managing fields for title, description, ingredients, and steps with dynamic add/remove handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks to fetch recipes and user profile data using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecipeMutations.ts: Provides mutation hooks for creating, updating, deleting recipes, and saving user profiles, with cache invalidation and toasts.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and theme variables with a food-themed color palette and dark mode adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/RecipeDetailPage.tsx: Displays recipe details, handles edit/delete actions for owners, and shows loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/RecipeEditorPage.tsx: Page for creating or editing recipes, handling authentication, ownership checks, data loading, and submitting to create or update recipes.
frontend/src/pages/RecipesBrowsePage.tsx: Displays a public recipe list with loading states and optional profile setup prompt for authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for project styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, and image asset needs for the recipe website.
